frontmatter.title: Enterprise Process Assessment
frontmatter.description: Discover existing enterprise process & capabilities and assess possible gaps for starting modernization program

internal.content:
---
title: Enterprise Process Assessment
description: Discover existing enterprise process & capabilities and assess possible gaps for starting modernization program
---

### What does Application Modernization actually mean?

FApplication modernization transforms your existing applications to new approaches on the cloud. We assess your existing workloads, applications and underlying platform and make recommendations while moving towards easily managed systems in the future.

### What does Application Modernization actually mean?

FApplication modernization transforms your existing applications to new approaches on the cloud. We assess your existing workloads, applications and underlying platform and make recommendations while moving towards easily managed systems in the future.
